description: This table contains information about feedback shared via Payer Platform.

columns.name: FEEDBACK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the Payer Platform feedback record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status of the Payer Platform feedback record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: SRC_ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the data exchange organization that sent the feedback.

columns.name: SRC_ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient for which this feedback applies. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The encounter type category ID for the feedback record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Registration


Walk-In


Hospital Encounter


Canceled


Unmerge


Contact Moved


Intake


EMPTY


Research Encounter


Recurring Plan


Update

columns.name: ENC_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient contact at the organization providing feedback.

columns.name: ENC_TIN
columns.description: The tax ID for the patient encounter at the organization providing feedback.
